intro: We saw this abandoned building on another website. The team decided it would be a nice place to explore. This makes us the followers, just as with the Hospital de Mercy. This does not happen often in our case. It are nice buildings, an abandoned school and home for youth. The building is quite well known in the urbex-world. However due to the heavy vandalism I won't post the history until it is sold or demolished. Serious warning: Nowadays the terrain is being guarded by guys with airsoft guns. They have a first shoot, than ask questions-mentality.
